verses.name: Numbers 11:1
verses.text: And when the people complained, it displeased the Lord: and the Lord heard it; and his anger was kindled; and the fire of the Lord burnt among them, and consumed them that were in the uttermost parts of the camp.

verses.name: Numbers 11:2
verses.text: And the people cried unto Moses; and when Moses prayed unto the Lord, the fire was quenched.

verses.name: Numbers 11:3
verses.text: And he called the name of the place Taberah: because the fire of the Lord burnt among them.
